entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:27 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains this morning. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains this morning. Wind becoming light late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:13 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:13 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming east 60 km/h gusting to 80 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:13 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 09:13 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28. Forecast issued 09:13 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 09:13 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
